external_games.name: TS Marketplace: Maunsell 59ft Low Window Corridor Coach Pack Southern Malachite Green

name: TS Marketplace: Maunsell 59ft Low Window Corridor Coach Pack Southern Malachite Green
summary: Take your simulation to the next level with these gorgeous Low Window Corridor Coaches! Built from 1926 to 1929 under the direction of Southern CME Richard Maunsell, these classical carriages were built to replace much of the wooden bodied pre-grouping stock Southern inherited from its constituents.
